item.title: How to fix buy x option
item.dc:creator: @kosmo50 kosmo50
item.description:
@kosmo50 wrote:

ok no1 has been able to help me fix this bug but here we goâ€¦

my source was limited to buying 100 items at once and i wanna make it 1000 instead so i changed this

else if (XinterfaceID == 3900) { //Shop if (EnteredAmount < 101) buyItem(XremoveID, XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); else sM("You cannot buy more than 100 items at a time."); }

TO

else if (XinterfaceID == 3900) { //Shop if (EnteredAmount < 1001) buyItem(XremoveID, XremoveSlot, EnteredAmount); else sM("You cannot buy more than 1k items at a time."); }

and when i click buy x and type 1000 it buys me alot more than 1000 and it kicks me outta the server, how do i fix that??

Read full topic
